articles.title: Software giant SAP opens $250 million lab in Singapore, to add 500 jobs - The Straits Times
articles.description:
SAP Labs Singapore is the first such facility by the German firm in South-east Asia, and its 21st globally.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: SINGAPORE - Singapore has attracted one more technology giant to set up a research and innovation facility here, involving $250 million in investment over five years and the promise of 500 jobs for s… [+2394 chars]

articles.title: Heartbreak as Afghan girls ordered home just hours after schools reopen - Times of India
articles.description: South Asia News: The Taliban ordered secondary girls schools in Afghanistan to shut Wednesday just hours after they reopened, an official confirmed, sparking confusion
